Reviews.Title: “Conveniently Located, Reasonably Priced and Friendly Service”

Reviews.Content: location perfect centre madrid excellent sight seeing theatre cinema check little slow check leaving elevator allocated floor shocked state carpet common areas threadbare somewhat dirty however entering room seeing much improved carpet rooms nicely decorated however hotels 3 star individual rooms tend larger beds rather simple single bed take advantage breakfast offered room consisted menu local vending machines available coffee soft drinks sweets first floor lounge conclusion price payed hotelscom happily satisfied however advertised walk price somewhat expensive standard

Reviews.Title: “Great money worth hotel”
